text: Gilbert Van Binst (5 July 1951 â€“ 3 January 2025) was a Belgian footballer. He played as a defender. He played for the Belgium national football team fifteen times from 1972 to 1977. Van Binst died in Zaventem, Belgium on 3 January 2025, at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Belgian footballers
